resources.string: Hello Student! Welcome! This is an app to help you track and manage your Terms, Courses, and Assessments.
Add a term using the button in the bottom right, or select an existing term to see details, edit, or delete that term.
Manage courses for this term using the list below. Checked courses will be added to the term; unchecked courses will be removed. Note: All courses must be removed before deleting the term.
